author: bridge-bot
content: <gakonst> this might be a basic q, are there any links to the consensus client forks which implement 4844?

author: inphi
content:
the latest implementation is at https://github.com/Inphi/prysm/tree/inphi/terencechain-rebase. It's on a different branch for the time being because it contains changes that are incompatible with the current devnet.

We use  https://github.com/Inphi/prysm/tree/inphi/clean-slate for the devnet.
